Literature.Title: Novel Gratisin Derivatives With High Antimicrobial Activity and Low Hemolytic Activity
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Imazeki Y, Shirane A, Fujinuma K, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=>100µg/ml)
